transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Haanji good morning. Mai Shelza bol rahi thi sir IndiaMART team se. Art Marble Place ke regarding aap aapne kal bhi sir call kiya tha. Kya baat hui sir? Matlab aap se discussion ho gaya tha mere khayal se Numaan ka do din pehle se dobara aapne call customer care pe call kiya hai na?
Customer: Nahi hua.
Customer: Nahi hua hai.
Executive: Discussion nahi hua?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: But kal jaise mai complaint dikha raha hu. Suniye. Abhi aap hamari complaint sun lo ya aap apna bol lo.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ek decide kar lo ya to pehle aap aap suna do puri kya sunna cha rahe ho aap. Aur ye hamari jo complaint hai wo likho aap.
Executive: [inaudible] bola hi nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi to aap aap jaise aise lag raha hai tape recorder baj raha hai.
Executive: Kahi nahi baj raha sir kuch bolna hai to boliye.
Customer: Hamari complaint agar aap likhna chahte ho. Suniye. Complaint agar likhna chahte ho to complaint likh lo. Anyatha time kharab aapka karna chahte ho ya mera karna chahte ho to vaise batao aap.
Executive: Sir mai aapka bhi time waste nahi karna chahti, apna bhi nahi karna chahti. Ab aap meri complaint lo meri complaint lo. Meri complaint lo phir. Complaint kya hai? Wo lo aap. Issue kya aa raha hai wo lo aap.
Customer: Boliye.
Customer: Shanivar ko maine complaint likhwai Numaan ko ye jo bylead wala jo dashboard hai wo bilkul white nazar aa raha hai. White ka matlab us pe kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Jo dashboard hai na. Page jo open karte hai wo ekdum white aa raha hai. To
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Unhone kaha ki sir aaj to Saturday hai kal Sunday hai parso Monday ko ho jayega. Maine kaha chalo thik hai koi baat nahi. Monday ko maine call kiya maine kaha sir aisa aisa issue aa raha hai. To
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kaha thik hai hum thik karwate hai isko. Thik hai Monday ko bhi nahi karwaya. Fir Tuesday ko aa gaya. Kal kal Tuesday thi. Kal Tuesday ho gayi. Wo wo ka wahi same issue aa raha hai to maine unko complaint me bola hai ki sir wahi problem chal rahi hai aaj char din se. Aur ye kab tak chalega? Sir ye to aise hi chalega. Maine kaha aise kyu chalega? Fir aap jo 70 buylead de rahe hai wo kaise consume karenge hum? Bataiye hume. Agar aap buylead nahi denge to hum kaise consume karenge aap batao is baat ka aap chalo aaj jawab de dijiye mujhe. Bataiye.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur payment jo hai maine star ka kareeb kareeb ek ki tariye meri final mai de chuka hu. Abhi tak ek rupaye ka ek paise ka business nahi kiya hai maine. Ab aap meri taraf aayenge to ye peeda aapko hogi ki nahi hogi? Ki humne business ke liye aapko diya hai payment aur aap 1% bhi response nahi de rahe ho. Marble Masjid member ka hamara whole product hai. Usse related koi bhi buylead, inquiries, buyer call bilkul bhi nahi aa rahe. Na koi update chal raha hai account pe.
Executive: Mai aapko batau sir kal kitni lead use ki aapne? Agar aap keh rahe ho mujhe lead nahi aa rahi member ki aur aap.
Customer: Suniye suniye suniye meri baat. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahi hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Dashboard is appearing completely white.

- Not receiving any buyleads, inquiries, or buyer calls.

- No update is going on the account.



Resolution:

- Executive put the call on hold.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, dashboard, complaint, payment, refund
